DrawerBackground.description: Use this to style the background of the whole drawer.

DrawerButton.description: The string value is a [style class](../Styles/ImageClass.style.md) name for drawer button in side drawer.

HeaderBackground.description: Use this to style the background of the header view.

HeaderHeadline.description: Use this to style the text view of headline.

HeaderSubHeadline.description: Use this to style the text view of subheadline.

HeaderSeparator.description: Use this to style the separator dividing header and menu area. Can also remove by setting border-bottom-width to 0.

HeaderIcon.description: The string value is a [style class](../Styles/ImageClass.style.md) name for header icon in side drawer.

SectionCaption.description:
Use this to style the text view of section caption.

This style can be overridden at section level.

SectionSeparator.description:
Use this to style the separators dividing sections. Can also remove by setting border-bottom-width to 0. 

This style can be overridden at section level.

SectionItemActive.description:
Use this to style menu item which is currently selected.

This style can be overridden at section and item level.

SectionItemOnPress.description:
Use this to style menu item when it is touched upon.

This style can be overridden at section and item level.

SectionItemInactive.description:
Use this to style all the menu items that are not selected.

This style can be overridden at section and item level.

SectionItemImage.description: The string value is a [style class](../Styles/ImageClass.style.md) name in menu item.
